description: Looking for love? Georgia may not be the best location to find it, according to WalletHub’s best places for singles list.
title: Georgia among worst states for singles
title_page: Georgia among worst states for singles
text:
Looking for love? Georgia may not be the best location to find it, according to WalletHub’s best places for singles list.
» RELATED: 7 winter Atlanta date ideas that won't break the bank
The finance website came up with its results by analyzing the 50 states and Washington D.C. using 23 metrics across three categories: dating opportunities, dating economics and romance and fun.
The Peach State ranked No. 33 overall, while Washington and Colorado earned first and second place, respectively.
Although Georgia earned the No. 14 spot for best dating opportunities, it was only No. 38 for dating economics and No. 41 for romance and fun.
Neighboring states also ranked low, overall. Mississippi was No. 51, Alabama was No. 50 and Tennessee was No. 43.
Want to know how the other cities fared? Here’s a map of the findings.
